001package org.nasdanika.graph.processor;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.FIELD;
004import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.METHOD;
005import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
006
007import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
008import java.lang.annotation.Target;
009
010/**
011 * A field or method to inject processor of config of matching registry entry 
012 * @author Pavel
013 *
014 */
015@Retention(RUNTIME)
016@Target({FIELD, METHOD})
017public @interface RegistryEntry {
018        
019        /**
020         * If not blank, the value shall be a <a href="https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/5.3.22/reference/html/core.html#expressions">Spring boolean expression</a>
021         * which is evaluated in the context of an element. 
022         * @return
023         */
024        String value() default "";
025        
026        /**
027         * If <code>true</code> config is injected, processor otherwise.
028         * @return   
029         */
030        boolean config() default false;
031                        
032}
